targets.query:
from(bucket: "SharedAirDFW")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "WIMDA")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "windSpeedMetersPerSecond")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] == "vaLo Node 01")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "SharedAirDFW")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "WIMDA")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "windAngleTrue")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] == "vaLo Node 01")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value + 20.0}))  
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

panels.title: VaLo Node 01: Wind Speed and Direction (WIMDA)

from(bucket: "SharedAirDFW")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "GPSGPGGA2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "latitudeCoordinate")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] == "${device_name}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

import "math"
from(bucket: "SharedAirDFW")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "GPGGA")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "latitude")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] == "${device_name}")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: +(math.floor(x: r._value/100.00) +  (r._value - 100.00*math.floor(x: r._value/100.00))/60.00) }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "SharedAirDFW")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "GPVTG")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "speedOverGroundKMPH")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] == "${device_name}")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value * 1000.0/(60.0*60.0)         }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "SharedAirDFW")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] == "${device_name}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "YXXDR")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pitch")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "SharedAirDFW")
